complexity._comment: O=Optimistic (best case), M=Most Likely, P=Pessimistic (worst case)
complexity._reasoning: Schema changes are well-defined, but migration script complexity moderate

dependencies._reasoning: Alembic migration tool is well-tested, PostgreSQL version verified

stack_compat._comment: Tested vs untested on current system
stack_compat._reasoning: Have tested migrations in dev, but production data volume unknown

knowledge._reasoning: Team has PostgreSQL experience, but first complex migration

testing._reasoning: Can test with production snapshot, rollback strategy documented

_usage_notes.output: Generates PERT analysis with confidence score and risk breakdown
